title.narrative: Projet de renforcement de l'état civil et de la décentralisation dans la région du Guéra

description.narrative: Contribuer à la mise en uvre des pratiques de bonne gouvernance dans le contexte de décentralisation au Tchad Renforcer les capacités des services techniques détat civil de la région du Guéra pour faciliter la délivrance dactes détat civil de qualité. Accompagner les acteurs communaux à mettre en uvre dans le cadre de la décentralisation un processus de développement concerté (planification et gestion).

participating-org.narrative: European Commission - Directorate-General for International Partnerships (INTPA)

organisation.narrative: Delegation of the European Union to Chad

department.narrative: Delegation of the European Union to Chad

sector.narrative: Public sector policy and administrative management

title.narrative: Niveau de concertation dans la commune ciblée de Bitkine

description.narrative: Reported results indicators by the European Commission ¿ International Cooperation and Development (DEVCO) may not represent the complete set of indicators monitored for the project. The results are reported using a contribution approach. This means that where a project has been financed by the EU jointly with other funders ¿ such as partner country governments or other donors ¿ the overall outputs of the collective effort are reported rather than outputs attributed to the share of funding provided by the EU. For higher levels of results, such as outcomes and impacts, the project will only have contributed to the overall effort.
